Posts.Content: Apr 21, 2010 11:12PM Sotiredofthis wrote: I had a severe enough case of costochondritis two weeks into a seven week radiation series, that it sent me to the emergency room.  I've been treating with Advil since and have not had a severe reoccurrence.  Interestingly enough, the radiation nurse told me there's no way to was related to the radiation but the Radioloigist came in afterward and said it was due to the radiation but it is a relatively rare reaction.
Posts.Title: Costochondritis? Liz08 Ardychan
